info: The SSEP will support the government’s Skills Sector Development Program (SSDP), 2014–2020, which aims at building an efficient skills development system to meet labor market demand. The SSDP is the first sector-wide, medium-term development program, incorporating several ministries’ training efforts. The SSEP will reorient the technical and vocational education and training (TVET) system to focus on increasing gainful employment of the graduates, thus contributing to human capital development. It builds on the long, extensive experience of the Asian Development Bank (ADB) in supporting Sri Lanka’s TVET system.
name: RBL:SKILLS SECTOR ENHANCEMENT PROGRAM
